text: A sredi lyudey yest' takiye, kotoryye berut, pomimo Allakha, ravnykh; oni lyubyat ikh, kak lyubyat Allakha. A te, kotoryye uverovali, sil'neye lyubyat Allakha. I yesli by uvideli te, kotoryye nechestivy, kogda oni uvidyat nakazaniye, chto sila prinadlezhit tselikom Allakhu i chto Allakh silen v nakazanii
